TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CreateUserErrorEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserError> event is raised when an attempt to create a new user with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> control fails. The CreateUserErrorEventArgs class provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs.CreateUserError%2A> property to indicate the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus> enumeration value that corresponds to the error that occurred.
## Examples In the following example, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserError> event is raised, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs.CreateUserError%2A> property of the CreateUserErrorEventArgs object is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control, `Label1`, to provide information on why the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserError> event occurred.
[!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_278_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_278_1.cs)]
The following is the .aspx file that can be used to run the preceding example.
[!code-cs[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_278_2.aspx)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_278_2.aspx)]

Docs.param: A object that describes the result of a attempt.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets a value indicating the result of a event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The CreateUserError property indicates the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipCreateStatus> enumeration value that corresponds to the error that occurred during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreatingUser> event.
## Examples The following example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard.CreateUserError> event to display the CreateUserError property value in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control, `Label1`. For an .aspx file that can be used to run the example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs> topic.
[!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.web.ui.webcontr_892_1.vb)] [!code-cs[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserErrorEventArgs#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.web.ui.webcontr_892_1.cs)]
